writeups.title: Building a Comprehensive Hardware Exploitation Framework
writeups.description: A deep dive into creating a modular framework for hardware security assessment, covering firmware analysis, JTAG debugging, and embedded system exploitation techniques.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Advanced RF Signal Analysis with Software-Defined Radio
writeups.description: Exploring SDR techniques for analyzing and exploiting wireless protocols, including Bluetooth Low Energy, WiFi, and proprietary RF communications.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Modern Physical Penetration Testing Methodology
writeups.description: A comprehensive guide to physical security assessments, covering lock picking, RFID cloning, social engineering, and covert entry techniques.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Firmware Reverse Engineering: From Binary to Vulnerability
writeups.description: Step-by-step process of reverse engineering embedded firmware, identifying vulnerabilities, and developing proof-of-concept exploits.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: IoT Device Security Assessment Framework
writeups.description: Systematic approach to evaluating IoT device security, including network analysis, firmware extraction, and hardware-based attacks.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Social Engineering for Physical Access Control
writeups.description: Advanced social engineering techniques specifically designed for gaining physical access to restricted areas during security assessments.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Bluetooth Low Energy Security: Attacks and Defenses
writeups.description: Comprehensive analysis of BLE security mechanisms, common attack vectors, and practical exploitation techniques.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Developing Embedded Linux Rootkits for Red Team Operations
writeups.description: Creating persistent access mechanisms in embedded Linux systems through kernel-level rootkit development.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: RFID Cloning and Badge Security Assessment
writeups.description: Practical guide to RFID security testing, including proximity card cloning, badge emulation, and access control bypass techniques.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Hardware Trojan Detection in IoT Devices
writeups.description: Methods for detecting malicious modifications in hardware components, including power analysis and electromagnetic techniques.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Advanced Wireless Network Infiltration Techniques
writeups.description: Comprehensive coverage of WiFi security assessment, including WPA3 attacks, enterprise network penetration, and wireless persistence.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong

writeups.title: Automotive CAN Bus Security and Exploitation
writeups.description: Understanding automotive network security, CAN bus protocols, and practical vehicle hacking techniques for security research.
writeups.author: Gabe Chew Zhan Hong
